scripts.gh-pages: rm -rf build/gh-pages/ && typedoc --includeDeclarations --out build/gh-pages/ --module commonjs --target es2015 --exclude '**/*.spec.ts' --mode modules --name Guido --readme README.md src/lib/ && touch build/gh-pages/.nojekyll && cp -r build/gh-pages/. dist/gh-pages/
scripts.prepare: typings install && gulp all:tsconfig.json && gulp :tslint.json && gulp all:dist
scripts.typedoc: typedoc --includeDeclarations --out doc/api/ --module commonjs --target es2015 --exclude '**/*.spec.ts' --mode modules --name Guido --readme README.md src/lib/
